tr.td: Calibrator, used for initial setting of calibration
Electronic QC, used with manufactured reference providing signals that simulate QC results
Specimen used for testing proficiency of the organization performing the testing (Filler)
Group (where a specimen consists of multiple individual elements that are not individually identified)
Pool (aliquots of individual specimens combined to form a single specimen representing all of the components.)
Specimen used for testing Operator Proficiency
Replicate (of patient sample as a control)
Verifying Calibrator, used for periodic calibration checks

description.value: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0369 ( Specimen role)

display.value: Calibrator, used for initial setting of calibration
Electronic QC, used with manufactured reference providing signals that simulate QC results

value.value: Electronische QC, gebruikt met fabrieksreferentie die signalen afgeeft die QC-resultaten stimuleren

display.value: Specimen used for testing proficiency of the organization performing the testing (Filler)

value.value: Monster gebruikt voor testen van vakbekwaamheid van de organisatie die de testen uitvoert (Filler)

display.value: Group (where a specimen consists of multiple individual elements that are not individually identified)

value.value: Groep (waarbij een monster bestaat uit meerdere individuele elementen die niet individueel worden geïdenticeerd)

display.value: Pool (aliquots of individual specimens combined to form a single specimen representing all of the components.)

value.value: Pool (aliquots van individuele monsters gecombineerd tot een enkel monster dat alle componenten bevat.)

display.value: Specimen used for testing Operator Proficiency

value.value: Monster gebruikt voor het testen van de vakbekwaamheid van de operator
Patiënt (standaard indien component geen waarde heeft)

display.value: Replicate (of patient sample as a control)
Verifying Calibrator, used for periodic calibration checks

value.value: Verificatie calibrator, gebruikt voor periodieke calibratietesten
